column2: "Just so you know, it's not like I can't deal with them or anything."
"But there's got to be a trick or something to get rid of them all easy like. And I figure if anyone knows it, it's you!"
"Won't you forgive me for showing such laziness? We're allies from the same class, right?"
"But yeah, I totally look up to you. So can I count on you to smack down some Aginises for me? Awesome!"
